articles.title: UK music streaming hits a high note amid the lows of Covid - The Guardian
articles.description: Lewis Capaldi leads the way as format accounts for more than 80% of music consumption in 2020
articles.content:
The angst-laden ballads of Lewis Capaldi were the biggest soundtrack of pandemic Britain, industry figures for 2020 show, as streaming of music shot up by more than 20% in lockdown.
